programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team responds after a gifted 14-year-old tennis player is kidnapped from her bedroom in the middle of the night.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A masked gunman opens fire at a bar, leaving its two owners dead and a third man wounded. Jay Mohr and John Heard guest star.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates when three people are found dead after a hurricane strikes Miami; Calleigh finds a woman shot to death in a house that was recently looted.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A gas man is engulfed in invisible flames and dies during a qualifying race at the Grand Prix Americas.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio must find his brother's killer and protect a niece he never knew existed; the team explores voyeuristic Internet sites in connection with a stockbroker's murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A woman found eaten by a shark turns out to have been bait for a private investigator hired by wives to catch their unfaithful husbands.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: In the late 1980s, Ray and Faye Copeland became the oldest couple on death row when a simple livestock scam escalated into murder.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: A 20-year-long murder spree is brought to an end by a single fingerprint and intensive surveillance.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: When police find a body behind a Sacramento, Calif., boardinghouse, they suspect grandmotherly Dorothea Puente.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: Bakery owner Robert C. Hansen is accused of raping his victims, turning them loose and hunting them down like animals.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When Mac and the team are blamed for a terrorist bombing, the Phoenix Foundation is forced to disavow them; the team must clear their names without support from back home.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: After an earthquake in Hawaii, Mac and the team join Chin and Kono from the Five-0 task force to rescue a group of government scientists trapped in a building; another group tries to steal top-secret weaponry from the scientists.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac's close friend from M.I.T. fakes her own death to prevent someone from killing her to suppress her scientific research.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When the team intercepts a terror group's message for Murdoc, instructing him to kill a tech analyst, Mac poses as a psychopath to save the intended victim.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A Senate committee questions the members of the BAU team; a familiar face may help keep the team united.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU team investigates a series of murders in Oklahoma; Reid gives JJ and Prentiss the cold shoulder.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: After a mass murder at an Internet security company, evidence indicates that the person responsible is not a typical serial killer; Prentiss is required to complete recertification training.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A killer targets survivors of a high-school massacre, who have gathered for a reunion; Hotch fears that his son is being bullied.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A series of children are abducted from troubled women in St. Louis; Rossi's first wife shares shocking news.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team investigates when multiple bodies are found in a national forest; Rossi faces an agonizing decision.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU investigates when bodies are exposed by tornadoes in Kansas; pressure at work affects J.J. at home.

programme.title: Criminal Minds

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A series of murders makes the team wonder if a notorious killer has returned; Reid wonders if he could be doing more with his abilities.

programme.desc: While transporting Jacob Calder to a safer prison, Cie is kidnapped and Chance and Calder must rescue her.

programme.desc: The sister of a murdered federal agent helps track down his killer.

programme.desc: Chance, after interrogation by Hardesty and Snow, is charged with murder when the man he has beaten dies; Cie disappears.

programme.desc: The team is hired by the Department of Defense to test the security at Fort Knox by trying to break in and steal a precious artifact.

programme.desc: The investigation of the bones of a shooting victim leads to a counterfeiting ring.

programme.desc: Brennan wakes up in the bathroom of her New Orleans motel room, bloodied and beaten with no memory of what happened.

programme.title: Rolling Away
programme.desc: Ryan Sheckler und weitere erfolgreiche Namen im Skateboard- und Sportbereich diskutieren über die Bedeutung von Skate-Videos und die Arbeitsmoral, die für die Produktion eines bahnbrechenden Clips erforderlich ist.

programme.title: Skate Tales
programme.desc: Skate Tales Madars Apse reist nach Curitiba, Brasilien, um sich mit dem unglaublichen adaptiven Profi-Skateboarder und Thrasher Magazine-Coverstar Felipe Nunes zu treffen.

programme.title: Skate Tales
programme.desc: Skate Tales Apache Skateboards ist eine Bewegung, die die historische Kultur der amerikanischen Ureinwohner mit der modernen Skateboard-Ästhetik verbindet und beiden Welten neue Energien verleiht. Madars schließt sich ihnen an, um mehr zu erfahren.

programme.title: Skate Tales
programme.desc: Skate Tales Die Fancy Lads sind die kreativste Skate-Crew der Welt. Sie verändern das Skateboard-Design, um neue Möglichkeiten für Tricks zu eröffnen. Madars Apse kommt vorbei, um das zu erkunden.

programme.title: Carlos Sainz: Live to Compete
programme.desc: Carlos Sainz: Live to Compete Nach seinen beiden WM-Titeln in den Jahren 1990 und 1992 wurde Carlos als "El Matador" bekannt. Zu dieser Zeit heiratete er auch und gründete eine Familie, wobei sein Sohn bald in seine Fußstapfen trat.

programme.title: ABC of ...
programme.desc: ABC of ... Das ist die Meisterklasse mit Rob Warner: Begriffe, Disziplinen, die Geschichte und ihre Helden. Hier erfährst du alles, was es über Mountainbiken zu wissen gilt!

programme.title: Highlights – Lenzerheide
programme.desc: Wirf einen Blick zurück auf alle Highlights des UCI Mountain Bike World Cup 2023 in Lenzerheide, Schweiz.

programme.title: Highlights – Leogang
programme.desc: Wirf einen Blick zurück auf alle Ereignisse des UCI Mountain Bike World Cup 2023 in Leogang, Österreich.

programme.title: Highlights – Vallnord
programme.desc: Wirf einen Blick zurück auf die Action beim UCI Mountain Bike World Cup 2023 in Vallnord, Andorra.

programme.title: Alles auf Schiene: Danny MacAskill "Wee Day Out"
programme.desc: Danny MacAskills Projekt "Wee Day Out" ist eine majestätische Reise durch die schottischen Highlands. Wirf einen exklusiven Insiderblick auf die Produktion des Films, mit Kommentaren von Danny selbst und dem Regisseur, seinem Langzeitkumpel Stu Thomson.

programme.title: MTB Stunts
programme.desc: Drei Teams demonstrieren neue Extreme des Mountainbikens: Im dichten Regenwald von Britisch-Kolumbien gibt es zahlreiche Hindernisse. Profi-Dirtjumps fordern die Fahrer in Neuseeland heraus. Und urbane Freerider finden gute Lines in den Straßen von Amsterdam und Deutschland.

programme.title: Ein Reiter in der Geisterstadt (Deutsch)
programme.desc: Danny MacAskill kehrt mit seinem neuesten Projekt zurück: Er erkundet die vergessene Geisterstadt Epecuén in Argentinien, wo die überfluteten, trostlosen Ruinen als Trialbike-Spielplatz dienen.

programme.title: MTB im Nahen Osten
programme.desc: Die Profi-Mountainbiker unternehmen einen Roadtrip durch die vielfältigen Landschaften Israels und Fabien Barel bekommt auf einer steilen Line durch unerwartetes Gelände einen Adrenalinschub, während Cedric Gracia auf dem Mount Sodom eine ultimative Road-Gap findet.

programme.title: Stronger
programme.desc: The inspiring true story of the real life 2013 Boston Marathon bombing survivor Jeff Bauman.

programme.title: The Winning Season
programme.desc: A washed-up has-been is brought on to coach the local girls' high school basketball team.

programme.desc: A man wakes up with no memory of who he is, and finds that everyone who comes within a certain distance of him suddenly dies.

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A member of the future human-resistance movement is teleported back to 1984 L.A. His purpose is to rescue Sarah Connor, the mother of the man who will lead the 21st-century rebels against tyrannical machines, from being killed before she can give birth. Standing in his way is a futuristic cyborg also sent back in time to assassinate the woman.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Vengeful vampire-hunter Blade (Wesley Snipes) makes it his mission to rid the world of the hidden society of undead who secretly prey on humanity. When a rebellious young vampire threatens to lead a new generation of bloodsuckers out of their shadowy underworld, it's up to the half-human, half-vampire Blade to prevent them from infesting Earth. Kris Kristofferson, N'Bushe Wright.

programme.title: Hell Fest
programme.desc: A masked serial killer known as "the Other" turns a horror-themed amusement park into his own personal playground, terrorizing a group of friends while the rest of the patrons believe that it is all part of the show.

programme.title: Leprechaun 4: In Space
programme.desc: A power-hungry Leprechaun holds a beautiful princess captive on a distant planet as part of his plan to rule the universe, but his plans are altered by the arrival of a rescue ship filled with Earth Marines. Warwick Davis, Jessica Collins, Guy Siner, Brent Jasmer, Rebekah Carlton, Tim Colceri, Gary Grossman.

programme.title: Leprechaun V: In The Hood
programme.desc: When three rappers want to get even with a pimp, they accidentally unleash a leprechaun who goes on a killing rampage in tha 'hood.

programme.title: Leprechaun: Back 2 tha Hood
programme.desc: The diminutive green ghoul (Warwick Davis) returns in the chilling sixth installment of the frightening "Leprechaun" film series. This time out, a group of inner-city friends gets the Leprechaun's Irish up when they happen upon his pot of gold and take it for themselves. The pint-sized monster strikes out to get his treasure back---and punish those who stole it. Tangi Miller, Sticky Fingaz.

programme.title: Drag Me To Hell
programme.desc: Ambitious L.A. loan officer Christine Brown incurs the wrath of a malevolent gypsy by refusing to grant her an extension on her home loan. Determined to get a promotion at work, Christine lays down the law when mysterious Mrs. Ganush literally begs for mercy at her feet. In retaliation, Mrs. Ganush places the curse of Lamia on her unfortunate target. Now, unless Christine can break the curse, she'll be tormented by a demon for three days before literally being dragged to hell.

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A member of the future human-resistance movement is teleported back to 1984 L.A. His purpose is to rescue Sarah Connor, the mother of the man who will lead the 21st-century rebels against tyrannical machines, from being killed before she can give birth. Standing in his way is a futuristic cyborg also sent back in time to assassinate the woman.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: A primatologist strives to rescue his beloved and once-peaceful albino gorilla. After an evil genetic experiment goes awry, the gorilla and two other gigantic mutated animals run amok in downtown Chicago.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Vengeful vampire-hunter Blade (Wesley Snipes) makes it his mission to rid the world of the hidden society of undead who secretly prey on humanity. When a rebellious young vampire threatens to lead a new generation of bloodsuckers out of their shadowy underworld, it's up to the half-human, half-vampire Blade to prevent them from infesting Earth. Kris Kristofferson, N'Bushe Wright.

programme.title: Blade 2
programme.desc: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.

programme.title: Blade: Trinity
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes is back in the thrilling finale to the horror trilogy, as Blade finds himself a wanted man and teams up with a female vampire-hunter (Jessica Biel) for a showdown with the king of the bloodsuckers, Dracula. Ryan Reynolds, Parker Posey, Natasha Lyonne, James Remar, Kris Kristofferson.

programme.title: Blade: Trinity
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes is back in the thrilling finale to the horror trilogy, as Blade finds himself a wanted man and teams up with a female vampire-hunter (Jessica Biel) for a showdown with the king of the bloodsuckers, Dracula. programme.title: The Ark
programme.desc: The crew arrives somewhere that seems too good to be true, and it just might be.

programme.title: Blade 2
programme.desc: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.

A writer (John Cusack) who debunks paranormal occurrences finds terrifying evidence to the contrary when he checks into a reputedly haunted hotel room in this spooky adaptation of a story by Stephen King. Samuel L. Jackson, Mary McCormack, Tony Shalhoub, Jasmine Jessica Anthony. Mikael Hafstrom directed.

programme.title: Total Gym 50 Years of Moving You
programme.desc: For years, Total Gym has been a leader in fitness, empowering millions to achieve their health goals. One piece of equipment does it all. Over 100 unique exercises. No assembly required. Folds for storing. Go to TotalGymDirect.com for special offers!

programme.title: True Crime 2024
programme.desc: Every 3 seconds an American's identity is stolen. Just how safe is your 401k? Your bank account? Your home? Your credit? Crime Reporter Tom Morris Jr. investigates the identity theft epidemic. Find out how you can help protect yourself with LifeLock.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid Programming.

A writer (John Cusack) who debunks paranormal occurrences finds terrifying evidence to the contrary when he checks into a reputedly haunted hotel room in this spooky adaptation of a story by Stephen King. Samuel L. Jackson, Mary McCormack, Tony Shalhoub, Jasmine Jessica Anthony. Mikael Hafstrom directed.

programme.title: The Purge
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a family defend their lavish home against murderous intruders during the one night of the year when all crime is legal. However, their resolve is tested by a stranger who appears in their gated community pleading for help.

programme.title: Moonfall
programme.desc: When a powerful force knocks the moon off of its orbit, former astronaut and NASA executive Jo Fowler immediately jumps into action to save humankind. Unfortunately for her, only Brian Harper, a character from her past, and KC Houseman, a conspiracy theorist, believe that she has the key to stopping the impending disaster. With only a few weeks until the displaced satellite crashes into Earth, the three heroically pursue their mission.

programme.title: Leprechaun
programme.desc: When his gold is stolen, an elf follows the culprit to get it back.

programme.title: Leprechaun 2
programme.desc: The killer sprite returns to the U.S. to find a mate.

Ryan Reynolds, Parker Posey, Natasha Lyonne, James Remar, Kris Kristofferson.

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: A legendary monster hunter is sent to Transylvania by a secret religious organization, where he battles Count Dracula, Frankenstein's creature and the Wolf Man in this homage to Universal horror classics.

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: A legendary monster hunter is sent to Transylvania by a secret religious organization, where he battles Count Dracula, Frankenstein's creature and the Wolf Man in this homage to Universal horror classics.

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: A family takes in a young man with scissors for hands. He is the unfinished experiment of a local eccentric who died before completing his creation. Dubbed Edward, he quickly falls in love with the family's oldest daughter, and becomes something of a sensation in the humdrum suburban neighborhood. Soon, however, his inability to fit in causes problems.

programme.title: The Purge
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a family defend their lavish home against murderous intruders during the one night of the year when all crime is legal. However, their resolve is tested by a stranger who appears in their gated community pleading for help.

programme.title: Leprechaun 3
programme.desc: The murderous imp (Warwick Davis) journeys to Las Vegas in pursuit of a student (John Gatins) who possesses a piece of his gold. Lee Armstrong, John DeMita, Michael Callan, Caroline Williams. Directed by Brian Trenchard-Smith.

programme.title: Leprechaun: Origins
programme.desc: A couple hiking through Ireland discover the horrifying truth surrounding an ancient legend.

programme.desc: When a powerful force knocks the moon off of its orbit, former astronaut and NASA executive Jo Fowler immediately jumps into action to save humankind. Unfortunately for her, only Brian Harper, a character from her past, and KC Houseman, a conspiracy theorist, believe that she has the key to stopping the impending disaster. programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Rocker Rob Zombie directed this terrifying reimagining of John Carpenter's seminal 1978 slasher film about a psycho killer who escapes from a psychiatric facility and goes on a bloody rampage on Halloween night.

programme.title: Halloween II
programme.desc: Unspeakable evil permeates the screen when Michael Myers returns to Haddonfield to resolve some unfinished family business and kills everyone in his path before coming face-to-face with his most-formidable adversary to date.
